Question: Shenzhen Apexel Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Apexel Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Mobile photography peripheral equipment

- Specializes in mobile camera lens, telescope lens, night vision binoculars camera, binoculars/monoculars, and laser rangefinder
- Strong R&D design team with experience in optical components
- Products have passed CE, ROHS, REACH, and other related certifications
- Focus on providing simplest, multifunctional, portable, professional, and smarter auxiliary photographic equipment
- Recent innovation and appearance patents, including the 2019 CES Innovation Award
- Emphasizes pursuing excellence, maintaining focus, honest cooperation, and open and win-win business philosophy
